sqlMap.select: select spacepost_id from space_post where spacepost_area=#spacepost_area#
select spacepost_id from space_post where spacepost_sort= #spacepost_sort#
select spacepost_id from space_post where spacepost_shopname=#spacepost_shopname#
select spacepost_id from hashtag where hashtag_name=#hashtag_name#
